en_raw: Hello!
en_clean: Hello!
jp_clean: こんにちは！

en_raw: Ah... Aren't you one of the saviors traveling with Mirabelle?
en_clean: Ah... Aren't you one of the saviors traveling with Mirabelle?
jp_raw: \n<\v[46]>あれ...\!\ きみはミラベルと旅する救国の英雄一行の？
jp_clean: あれ... きみはミラベルと旅する救国の英雄一行の？

en_raw: You're doing so much for us. I wish I could help you in some way.
en_clean: You're doing so much for us. I wish I could help you in some way.
jp_raw: \n<\v[46]>きみたちのしていることはすばらしいことだ。\!私も役に立てればよいのだが。
jp_clean: きみたちのしていることはすばらしいことだ。私も役に立てればよいのだが。

en_raw: ...I know!
en_clean: ...I know!
jp_clean: ...そうだ！

en_raw: I grow flowers... Beautiful flowers that could make someone you like happy!
en_clean: I grow flowers... Beautiful flowers that could make someone you like happy!
jp_raw: \n<\v[46]>私が育てている花...\!\ 美しい花は、君の好きな人を幸せな気分にしてくれる！
jp_clean: 私が育てている花... 美しい花は、君の好きな人を幸せな気分にしてくれる！

en_raw: Here, have one! You could keep it, or gift it to someone special.
en_clean: Here, have one! You could keep it, or gift it to someone special.
jp_raw: \n<\v[46]>さあ、1輪あげるよ！\!\ 自分で持っていてもいいし、特別な人に渡してもいい。
jp_clean: さあ、1輪あげるよ！ 自分で持っていてもいいし、特別な人に渡してもいい。

en_raw: (You got the BRIGHT FLOWER!)
en_clean: (You got the BRIGHT FLOWER!)
jp_clean: (「派手な花」を手に入れた！)

en_raw: (You put the flower in your pocket along with your Souvenirs.)
en_clean: (You put the flower in your pocket along with your Souvenirs.)
jp_raw: (ポケットの「思い出の品」に入れておこう。)
jp_clean: (ポケットの「思い出の品」に入れておこう。)

en_raw: [You can give the Flower to one of your party members by talking to them!]
en_clean: [You can give the Flower to one of your party members by talking to them!]
jp_raw: \m[vtuto][この花はパーティーの誰かに話しかけて渡すことができるよ！]\m[rb]
jp_clean: [この花はパーティーの誰かに話しかけて渡すことができるよ！]

en_raw: (You got the flower again!)
en_clean: (You got the flower again!)
jp_clean: (もう一度、花を手に入れた！)

en_raw: (You could give it to someone else this time...)
en_clean: (You could give it to someone else this time...)
jp_raw: \m[clear](今回は誰かに渡してもいい...)
jp_clean: (今回は誰かに渡してもいい...)

en_raw: Heh, have you looked around my house? I cannot get rid of those fast enough!
en_clean: Heh, have you looked around my house? I cannot get rid of those fast enough!
jp_raw: \m[vman]\n<\v[46]>はは、私の家の周りを見たかい？\!\ 取っても取っても追いつかないほどあるんだ！
jp_clean: はは、私の家の周りを見たかい？ 取っても取っても追いつかないほどあるんだ！

en_raw: That's why everyone in Dormont has some, too.
en_clean: That's why everyone in Dormont has some, too.
jp_raw: \m[vman]\n<\v[46]>だから、ドーモント中の人にあげてるよ。
jp_clean: だから、ドーモント中の人にあげてるよ。

en_raw: And... It's just nice, isn't it? To be able to give physical proof of your love to people?
en_clean: And... It's just nice, isn't it? To be able to give physical proof of your love to people?
jp_raw: \m[vman]\n<\v[46]>それに...\!\ 花はいいものだろう？\!\ 愛の証をかたちにして渡せるものだと思わないかい？
jp_clean: それに... 花はいいものだろう？ 愛の証をかたちにして渡せるものだと思わないかい？

en_raw: (It is.)
en_clean: (It is.)
jp_clean: (確かに。)

en_raw: (Not really.)
en_clean: (Not really.)
jp_clean: (そうでもないぞ。)

en_raw: (You're learning that physical things fade, too.)
en_clean: (You're learning that physical things fade, too.)
jp_raw: (かたちあるものだって衰え、朽ちていく。)
jp_clean: (かたちあるものだって衰え、朽ちていく。)

en_raw: (You need to ask...)
en_clean: (You need to ask...)
jp_clean: (聞きたいことは...)

en_raw: What I asked the Tree?
en_clean: What I asked the Tree?
jp_clean: 願いの木に頼んだこと？

en_raw: ...It's private, isn't it?
en_clean: ...It's private, isn't it?
jp_raw: \m[vman]\n<\v[46]>...それは個人的なことだろう？
jp_clean: ...それは個人的なことだろう？

en_raw: I didn't tell the Head Housemaiden, so I don't see why I'd have to tell you. Sorry.
en_clean: I didn't tell the Head Housemaiden, so I don't see why I'd have to tell you. Sorry.
